title: 44 Musi Mushumo Wanga Wo No Fhela.

lines: SDAH:
AH:
1. Musi mushumo wanga wo fhela fhano fhasi,
Muvhili wo ambadzwa u sa sina,
Zwenezwo Mutshidzi wanga ndi do mu divhesa,
Ene a takala a tshi mmbona.
Nda mu divha, nda mu divha, ndi do ima tsini-tsini hawe,
Nda mu divha, nda mu divha, nga dzintho zwandani zwawe.
2. Ndi do takala ndi tshi vho vhona tshifhatuwo,
Na ito lawe li na vhuthu kha nne,
Na mbilu yanga i do livhuha nga lufuno,
Lwe lwa nndugiselela-vho vhudzulo.
3. rine ri vho do vhona vho faho kale-kale,
A ri tsha do dovha ra fhambana-vho,
A ri tsha do dovha ra fhambana ngei tadulu,
Ndi tama u vhona Murena wanga.
4. Na nne ndi do dzhena mudini nga nguvho tshena,
Ndi do vha afho hu sina zwililo,
Ndi do imba luimbo lwa vhothe vho tshidzwaho,
Musi ndi thsi vhona Mutshidzi wanga.
